import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const PersonForm = (props) => { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(0) const handleShowForm = () => setShowForm(!showForm) return (
name:
number:
) } export default PersonForm
